getPrice(address).details: Get the current price of a token in USD with 8 decimals

params.token: The token address to get price for

returns.price: The current price in USD (8 decimals)

setPriceFeed(address,bytes32).details: Associate a token with its Pyth price feed id

updatePriceFeeds(bytes[]).details: Pushes fresh prices to Pyth on-chain; caller must provide update data and fee.
